channel.title: [Showoff] I tried my hand at primitives - Blade of Luciendar [Showoff]
channel.description:
Well here is me using primitives, I think it turned out alright, Just a little bit blocky...y'know. Rate, hate, and/or appreciate ;D
EDIT ---- Metaseq file attached!
metaseq view one... [URL=http://img63.imageshack.us/i/bladeofluc1.png/][IMG]http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/2975/bladeofluc1.png[/img][/URL]
metaseq view two... [URL=http://img63.imageshack.us/i/bladeofluc2.png/][IMG]http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/2958/bladeofluc2.png[/img][/URL]
Datmaker View...Makes the blade color kinda funky... [URL=http://img696.imageshack.us/i/bladeofluc4.png/][IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/5929/bladeofluc4.png[/img][/URL]
And the wireframe for all who are interested :)... [URL=http://img687.imageshack.us/i/bladeofluc3.png/][IMG]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/6613/bladeofluc3.png[/img][/URL]
Enjoy! Will release if it is desired to be that way.

item.title: [Showoff] I tried my hand at primitives - Blade of Luciendar [Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Thanks everyone and Dylan, I will keep you tips in mind next time around! And I made the hilt pieces (the two that have 9 billion faces) i made those like that for the black coloring in the middle

Read full topic

item.source: [Showoff] I tried my hand at primitives - Blade of Luciendar [Showoff]

item.title: [Showoff] I tried my hand at primitives - Blade of Luciendar [Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

As requested by Tribb: Criticism.

the edge is un steady, and inconsistant. The tip was done incorrectly. all points shouldnt be connected to form a tip, there are better, gradual fall-off tip methods. From Quality-Poly, this model would fail. WAY too many faces for the hilt, i understand that you needed to get the shape, but its still too excessive. Thats all I’m going to say, no need to be too much of a downer. Keep in mind, for being new to primitives, this is a decent model.

Read full topic
item.source: [Showoff] I tried my hand at primitives - Blade of Luciendar [Showoff]
